name: Aura
description: A work that I interpret when I see someone who is "my mecca" at that time. When at that time I kept watching him on the internet and saw how amazing his work, how at that time I was so crazy about him and hoped that one day I could see his work for real. I was so amazed by the way he found his identity and it became my inspiration also in finding my identity. And this is my interpretation of Pierre Soulages "the master of black".
